1.0.2.name: connect20/Creativestyle_Sare
1.0.2.description: Easily integrate SARE email marketing software with Magento. Synchronize newsletter subscribers, bought items and sales figures for ultimate control over your email marketing campaigns.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
